user.title: Step 1 - Initial Setup
user.description:
Welcome to Piscinexa setup! Let's start by defining the basic information for your pool.

- Enter a unique name for your pool.
- Select the pool type (square or round).

dimensions.title: Step 2 - Pool Dimensions
dimensions.description:
Enter your pool's dimensions to calculate its volume.

- For a square pool, provide the length, width, and depth.
- For a round pool, provide the diameter and depth.

Values must be in meters.

ph_config.title: Step 3 - pH Sensor Setup
ph_config.description:
Choose how to configure the pH for your pool.

- **Manual input**: Enter the current measured and target pH values.
- **Select a sensor**: Use an existing sensor to measure the current pH.

ph_manual.title: Step 3 - Manual pH Input
ph_manual.description:
Enter the pH values for your pool.

- **Current pH (measured)**: The current pH of your pool, measured manually (optional).
- **Target pH (ideal)**: The ideal pH you want to achieve (required, typically between 7.2 and 7.6 for a pool).
ph_manual.no_sensor_ph: Piscinexa could not find a compatible pH sensor. You must configure the values manually.

ph_sensor.title: Step 3 - Select pH Sensor
ph_sensor.description:
Select a sensor to measure the current pH of your pool and set the ideal target value.

- **pH sensor**: Choose an existing sensor in your system (optional, select 'No sensor' to skip).
- **Target pH (ideal)**: The ideal pH you want to achieve (required, typically between 7.2 and 7.6 for a pool).

confirm_ph_sensor.title: Step 3 - pH Confirmation
confirm_ph_sensor.description: No pH sensor was selected, and no manual value is available. What would you like to do?

chlore_config.title: Step 4 - Chlorine Sensor Setup
chlore_config.description:
Choose how to configure the chlorine for your pool.

- **Manual input**: Enter the current measured and target chlorine values.
- **Select a sensor**: Use an existing sensor to measure the current chlorine.

chlore_manual.title: Step 4 - Manual Chlorine Input
chlore_manual.description:
Enter the chlorine values for your pool.

- **Current chlorine (measured, mg/L)**: The current chlorine level in your pool, measured manually (optional).
- **Target chlorine (ideal, mg/L)**: The ideal chlorine level you want to achieve (required, typically between 1 and 3 mg/L for a pool).
chlore_manual.no_sensor_chlore: Piscinexa could not find a compatible chlorine sensor. You must configure the values manually.

chlore_sensor.title: Step 4 - Select Chlorine Sensor
chlore_sensor.description:
Select a sensor to measure the current chlorine level in your pool and set the ideal target value.

- **Chlorine sensor**: Choose an existing sensor in your system (optional, select 'No sensor' to skip).
- **Target chlorine (ideal, mg/L)**: The ideal chlorine level you want to achieve (required, typically between 1 and 3 mg/L for a pool).

confirm_chlore_sensor.title: Step 4 - Chlorine Confirmation
confirm_chlore_sensor.description: No chlorine sensor was selected, and no manual value is available. What would you like to do?

temperature_config.title: Step 5 - Temperature Sensor Setup
temperature_config.description:
Choose how to configure the temperature for your pool.

- **Manual input**: Enter the current measured pool temperature.
- **Select a sensor**: Use an existing sensor to measure the current temperature.

temperature_manual.title: Step 5 - Manual Temperature Input
temperature_manual.description:
Enter the current measured temperature of your pool.

- **Current temperature (°C)**: The current water temperature, measured manually (optional).
temperature_manual.no_sensor_temperature: Piscinexa could not find a compatible temperature sensor. You must configure the values manually.

temperature_sensor.title: Step 5 - Select Temperature Sensor
temperature_sensor.description:
Select a sensor to measure the current temperature of your pool.

- **Temperature sensor**: Choose an existing sensor in your system (optional, select 'No sensor' to skip).

confirm_temperature_sensor.title: Step 5 - Temperature Confirmation
confirm_temperature_sensor.description: No temperature sensor was selected, and no manual value is available. What would you like to do?

power_config.title: Step 6 - Power Sensor Setup
power_config.description:
Choose whether to use a sensor to measure the power consumption of your pool or leave this field empty.

- **Manual input**: Leave this field empty.
- **Select a sensor**: Enter the ID of an existing sensor to measure power consumption.

power_manual.title: Step 6 - Manual Power Input
power_manual.description: No value to enter for power. This field will be left empty.
power_manual.no_sensor_power: Piscinexa could not find a compatible power sensor. This field will be left empty.

power_sensor.title: Step 6 - Select Power Sensor
power_sensor.description:
Enter the entity ID of the sensor to measure power consumption.

- **Power sensor entity ID**: Provide the exact entity ID (optional, leave empty to skip, e.g., sensor.pool_power).

confirm_power_sensor.title: Step 6 - Power Confirmation
confirm_power_sensor.description: No power sensor was selected. What would you like to do?

treatment_config.title: Step 7 - Treatment Types Configuration
treatment_config.description: Select the types of chemical treatments used for your pool.

summary.title: Step 8 - Summary
summary.description:
Here is a summary of your configuration. Review the details before confirming.

{summary}

init.title: Piscinexa Options
init.description:
Adjust the target settings for your pool.

- **Target pH**: The ideal pH value you want to achieve.
- **Target chlorine**: The ideal chlorine level you want to achieve (mg/L).
- **Sensors**: Select or update the sensors used to measure pH, chlorine, and temperature.

error.name_duplicate: This name is already used by another pool.
error.ph_invalid: Invalid pH value (must be between 0 and 14).
error.ph_required_if_no_sensor: A current pH value is required if no pH sensor is selected.
error.sensor_required_if_no_ph: A pH sensor is required if no current pH value is provided.
error.chlore_invalid: Invalid chlorine value (must be greater than or equal to 0).
error.chlore_required_if_no_sensor: A current chlorine value is required if no chlorine sensor is selected.
error.sensor_required_if_no_chlore: A chlorine sensor is required if no current chlorine value is provided.

test_calcul.description: Tests the calculation for a specific pool

reset_valeurs.description: Resets the values for a specific pool

apply_treatment.description: Applies a treatment to the pool and updates the sensors

treatment_form.description: Treatment form (Liquid, Granules, Chlorine shock (powder), Slow-release tablet)

quantity.description: Applied quantity (in liters, grams, or units depending on the form)
